mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_email, user_password, user_phone, user_name, user_type) values(#{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userPhone}, #{userName}, #{userType})
mapper.select: select u.id, user_email, user_password, user_phone, user_type, user_name, user_intro, user_visit_count, user_latest_login, user_state, created_datetime, updated_datetime, a.auth_provider from tbl_user u join tbl_auth a on u.id = a.id where user_email = #{userEmail}

select u.id, user_email, user_password, user_phone, user_type, user_name, user_intro, user_visit_count, user_latest_login, user_state, created_datetime, updated_datetime, a.auth_provider from tbl_user u join tbl_auth a on u.id = a.id where user_email = #{userEmail} and user_password = #{userPassword}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set user_visit_count = user_visit_count + 1, user_latest_login = current_timestamp where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select u.id, user_email, user_password, user_phone, user_type, user_name, user_intro, user_visit_count, user_latest_login, user_state, created_datetime, updated_datetime, a.auth_provider from tbl_user u join tbl_auth a on u.id = a.id where u.id = #{id}
